disclaimerContent: Current knowledgebase includes limited public information from our most reliable sources, such as <0>Miles Guo</0>, <1>NFSC</1>, Doctors in special hearing on Covid-19 vaccine injuries, and facts and data referenced by other vaccine truth sources.. AI answers questions based on information/data from these sources. So we cannot be responsilbe for the final generated content. We are working on knowledgebase visualization, so soon knowledgebase content will/can be audited publicly.

timelineName1_1: Wuhan Health Commission reports first case of Wuhan pneumonia
timelineName1_2: China officially acknowledges human-to-human transmission of coronavirus

However, the launch of the new coronavirus vaccine is the purpose, the vaccine is a disaster, and the new coronavirus vaccine is the real killing tool.
timelineName2_1: The Chinese Communist Party has been approved to start clinical trials in China (the first phase of clinical trials has only started at this time, what gave them the courage to start mass production at the end of February 2020)
timelineName2_2: China has launched phase II clinical trials domestically. (Two weeks have not passed since the end of the first phase of the trial, and the second phase has started before the clinical data of the first phase is available. Is this because you are being arrogant or do you think it is not necessary at all?)
timelineName2_3: The CCP announced phase II clinical data in The Lancet (clinical results showed that 95% of the vaccinated group produced antibodies, while about 72% experienced adverse reactions such as fever, fatigue, and pain at the injection site, and 9% of the high-dose group experienced grade three adverse reactions. Imagine how scary mass vaccination would be.)

timelineSubTitle: Is the Covid-19 vaccine safe and effective being brought to market so quickly? Let's see what happened before and after
vtSubIntro: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) released a Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine data document on March 1, 2022, which mentioned up to 1,291 side effects. These side effects include kidney damage, acute flaccid myelitis, brainstem embolism, cardiac arrest, hemorrhagic encephalitis, and more
